start.text: Your name is Bayley, a 21-year-old living in the Canberra suburb of Belconnen. You’ve just had a relationship breakdown and have nowhere to go. What do you do?

street1.text: You move onto the street. After one rough night, you decide to look for some more options.

options.text: Try to get a job at Maccas

maccas1.text: The manager instantly rejects you when they find out you’re homeless.

options.text: Sleep on the side of the road

roadSleep.text: Everything gets stolen and you fall ill. Do you go to the hospital without your Medicare card?

bridgeSleep.text: Everything gets stolen and you fall ill. Do you go to the hospital without your Medicare card?

tryThrough1.text: You try to get through the sickness but it gets worse. Turns out you were poisoned. You pass away.

hospital1.text: You're treated in time, but without ID, the hospital charges you $4000.

fightHospital.text: You attack nurses. Security knocks you out. You die from injuries.

bankruptcy.text: You accept bankruptcy. You now need food.

options.text: Try to get through without food

dumpster1.text: The fruit you found was contaminated. You get food poisoning and die.

starve1.text: You starve to death due to recent illness and no food.
